member.name: DML_FEATURE_QUERY_FEATURE_LEVELS
member.summary: Used to query a DirectML device for its support for one or more feature levels. See . The feature constant is DML_FEATURE_FEATURE_LEVELS, and the support data type is .

member.name: DML_FEATURE_QUERY_FEATURE_LEVELS.RequestedFeatureLevelCount
member.summary: The number of elements in the RequestedFeatureLevels array.

member.name: DML_FEATURE_QUERY_FEATURE_LEVELS.RequestedFeatureLevels
member.summary: An array of feature levels to query support for. When returns, the struct contains the highest feature level in this array that is supported by the device.
